headline: Energy Is Taking a Hit Today. Oil Prices Are Lower.
summary: Oil prices and energy-related stocks were down across the board on Monday morning.  WTI crude prices, the U.S. benchmark, are down 0.1% today to $64.27 a barrel.  The S&P 500 energy sector is the biggest loser of the day so far, down 1.1%.

headline: Burns & McDonnell Executive Jon Wright Joins House of Bricks® to Bring Industrial-Scale Insight to Startups
summary: BIRMINGHAM, Mich., July 14, 2025--Jon Wright of Burns & McDonnell joins House of Bricks® to help founders scale real businesses with strategy, systems, and execution.

headline: Bank of America Lowers PT on Schlumberger Limited (SLB); Maintains ‘Buy’ Rating
summary: Billionaire Kerr Neilson has bought over $88 worth of shares in Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB), representing 5.10% of his stock portfolio, securing the company a spot in Billionaire Kerr Neilson’s 10 Stock Picks with Huge Upside Potential. Bank of America cut down its price target on Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) from $42 to $40 on July 7, […]
